div.p: Greetings. Brother is a living letter; through him, you will learn all about us.

I give you and your sons and sons-in-law the greatest thanks for the most splendid gifts sent to my daughter; but how can I repay this generosity and magnificence of yours? I pray to the Lord that He may repay you and continue to bless you perpetually, as He does.
About the rest, soon through LÃ¶ffelsperger; for now, I am very busy, so I cannot say more.
To the most distinguished man, Mr. Heinrich Bullinger, the most faithful pastor of the Zurich church, his honorable lord and dearest godfather.
